    • Method Detail

      • setSpotifyAppRemote

        public static void setSpotifyAppRemote(com.spotify.android.appremote.api.SpotifyAppRemote spotifyAppRemote)
        Must be called to initialize the Spotify Player. Sets our appRemote so we can make calls directly to Spotify and "subscribes" to the phone's Spotify Player so we get live events such as Play and Pause.
        Parameters:
        spotifyAppRemote: - Spotify's api for communication with their built-in player

      • playIfNotPlaying

        public static void playIfNotPlaying()
        Plays the first song in the Queue if it's not already playing

                             long playbackPosition)
        Async Play function, calls a timer to monitor the player
        Parameters:
        track - track to be played
        playbackPosition - Position to start playback
